User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Nalanda platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity, matches Firebase Auth UID.

avatar.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

role.description: User's role within the system (e.g., Admin, Teacher, Student).

coins.description: The number of coins the user has.

gold.description: The amount of gold the user has.

diamonds.description: The amount of diamonds the user has.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Includes standard user information like email, name, and role.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.
